meanings.definition: (Irish mythology) A legendary spear, one of the treasures of the Tuatha Dé Danann.
meanings.english_definition: In Irish mythology, a legendary spear, one of the treasures of the Tuatha Dé Danann.

examples.sentence: The lughdoan was said to be invincible in battle.
examples.translation: ルグドーンは戦いにおいて無敵であると言われていた。

etymology.value: Derived from the name of the god Lugh, associated with light and skill.
